name: sssseq
body: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wb(wss(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0)))

stmt.origin: rbaibr(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0))
stmt.pretty: rbaibr(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ c0, c1 = c0)

-| wb(wceq(c1, c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wss(c0, c1)))

-| wb(wceq(c1, c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wss(c0, c1)))

comment: If a class is a subclass of another class, the classes are equal iff the other class is a subclass of the first class. (Contributed by AV, 23-Dec-2020.)
